pageContext.claim: “As a result of these extraordinary steps by the administration, we added a record 7 million jobs in the two months past alone.”
pageContext.analysis: The recovery has been faster than many predicted but the president is glossing over some key facts Less than half of the jobs lost as a result of the pandemic have returned. 11.5 million fewer people are working in September than were in February. Moreover, fewer people are working now than four years ago.
